rows.label: tev023701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Shallot about the restaurant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Shallot if she has any interesting news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Shallot about the restaurant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Shallot about the restaurant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0001
rows.name:
Welcome to Army Pizza, where we give you a blast of
salami and cheese straight to the gut![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0002
rows.name:
Founded by Powell and Camilla, this is New LA's
hottest eatery![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0003
rows.name:
Sure, the owner is tough and...kinda scary.
But the pizzas he makes are works of art that taste
as good as they look![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0004
rows.name:
And his wife Camilla is a wonderful person who took
me in when I quit my job and had nowhere else to go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'm just a part-timer here, but I want to do everything
I can to make this restaurant a nicer place to visit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0006
rows.name:
We deliver throughout New LA, so you can call in an
Army Pizza air strike anywhere, anytime![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0009
rows.name:
There's a BLADE who always comes in here to eat by
herself. She always seems kinda lonely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0010
rows.name:
She was just telling me that she's being sent on a
mission to Oblivia's Big Arch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0011
rows.name: It made me wonder if she's doing THAT by herself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0012
rows.name:
I mean, if she were, that would be really dangerous,
right? She certainly doesn't look all that tough...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0013
rows.name:
I hope she has some friends to watch her back,
though she's never mentioned having any...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0021
rows.name:
As you can see, business is booming thanks to those
long-eared shorties![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0022
rows.name:
Powell is drenched with sweat from cooking up so
many grenade pizzas...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0023
rows.name:
And Camilla and I do nothing but run back and forth
between the restaurant and the Ma-non ship![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0024
rows.name:
Naturally, I'm thrilled to see our cute little pizzeria
become such a big hit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0025
rows.name:
...Although when I see the exhaustion on Camilla's face,
I can't help but worry a little.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0026
rows.name:
She's not the sort to complain, but she's been working
nonstop for I-don't-know how long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0027
rows.name: I just hope she isn't overdoing it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0042
rows.name: I'm sorry... Everything is such a mess right now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0043
rows.name: I'm really not in the mood to talk about the restaurant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0044
rows.name: Sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Shallot about the restaurant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Shallot about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0045
rows.name:
Powell ran off somewhere in a hurry,
and now I'm the only one left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0046
rows.name:
At first I didn't know what to do, but then I decided
that I'd do everything I could to keep Army Pizza
up and running.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0047
rows.name:
I still can't make a very good grenade pizza,
and I know next to nothing about how to manage
a business...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0048
rows.name:
But I'll just have to keep cooking up pizzas till they
start to improve! Oh, and I plan to ask Coco at
the Sunshine Café for business advice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0049
rows.name:
If I'm gonna keep this place running,
I've got a lot to learn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0050
rows.name:
If Camilla and the others are ever able to come back,
I want them to be proud of what I've done with their
little Army Pizza![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0053
rows.name:
I've finally learned how to run a restaurant by myself,
but I'm still making huge mistakes every day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0054
rows.name:
Powell wasn't just some scary guy—he was also a
really great businessman![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0055
rows.name:
He'd make a pizza with whatever crazy toppings the
Ma-non wanted because he was a pro like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0056
rows.name:
Even that time a Ma-non ordered a melon, ketchup,
and cheese pizza, he made it look incredible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0057
rows.name: I'd like to be as good as he was one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023701_MSG0058
rows.name:
But it was Camilla who loved this place the most.
So I'm gonna get Army Pizza firing on all cylinders,
just the way she'd want it to be![ST:wait ]
